room_title: Escape room "Baby Unicorn Rescue" by Clock N Lock in Portage
room_description:
In a regrettable turn of events, the Wizard Gary has imprisoned a baby unicorn, now becoming The Evil Wizard Gary! As evil wizards are wont to do, he has trapped the poor creature away in the dungeon Animal Keep. Outside, the unicorn’s companions rally, seeking your help to free their trapped friend. Can your team of 2 to 4 players unravel the mysteries of the wizard’s spell room? Do you have what it takes to crack his magical codes and break the spell surrounding his lair? This exciting, family-friendly room is sure to challenge your wits and serves as a great introduction to escape rooms!

Baby Unicorn Rescue is a magical-sized, 1-hour escape game designed for double-dates and  smaller groups. It’s a great option for families with younger children who are looking to involve everyone in their weekend activities. Across the country, there is a growing demand for engaging, thought-provoking escapes that are challenging, rewarding, and kid-friendly. This room aims to meet that demand by offering both a whimsical theme and puzzles that every family member can contribute to.
